StoredProcedureSqlServerv2k5.name: [M8412_Get_Person_Duty_Preference]
StoredProcedureSqlServerv2k5.body:
@PersonID INT =0 AS
SELECT p.Billet , (select b.Billet_ID from M8412_LK_Billet b where b.Billet=p.Billet) Billet_ID , p.Loca.on , le.(convert(varchar,p.Update_Date,102),4) + substring(convert(varchar,p.Update_Date,102),6,2) + right(convert(varchar,p.Update_Date,102),2) Update_Date FROM dbo.M8412_Duty_Preference p WHERE p.Person_ID=@PersonID order by p.Update_Date desc
